summary: June 25 is the 176th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Simon IV of Montfort, lord of Montfort-l'Amaury, 5th earl of Leicester , also known as Simon de Montfort the elder, was a French warlord who took part in the Fourth Crusade  and was a prominent leader of the Albigensian Crusade. He died at the siege of Toulouse in 1218.
title: Simon de Montfort, 5th Earl of Leicester
